summary: The activities of Nubi (Myrna Loy), a minx-like, Hungarian gypsy girl who, while on the run from her abusive husband, takes shelter in a farmhouse, where she seduces and holds in thrall all the male members of the family.
cast: Alice Joyce|Richard Tucker|Myrna Loy|Loretta Young|Zasu Pitts|Carroll Nye|Harry Cording|George Hackathorne|Marcia Harris|Knute Erickson|Nicholas Soussanin|Jack Dart|Frankie Genardi|Seymour Kupper|Loretta Lowell
keywords: pre code film|hungarian gypsy girl|seduction|remorse|gypsy camp
title: The Squall
